name: Tomás_#VectorMode
description: Tomás, the crypto tomato is the transmedia character that @luisiyomotion and I created exclusively for the second challenge of @hackmafizmalaga, a cinema hackathon that I'm participating with other 198 speakers of Hibero-American and Hispanic content creators since March, and in the second challenge it was proposed for us to develop a 1 min vertical video that sells the tomato, and so I thought of a virtual character that could be used in any type of digital media and that was a tomato, we brought Tomás to life and produced a video in Stopmotion for the challenge, and now it's literally up for auction as #NFT are these 3 horrible and very rare versions of Tomás on the @hicetnunc2000 platform. Watch the videos of the second challenge on the @hackmafizmalaga channel: https://bit.ly/2UpKbZo / 4500x4500
